      Returns:
      ResourceCard chosen

    • DrawFromUncovered

      public ResourceCard DrawFromUncovered(int which) throws NullPointerException
      Draw from the deck function accessible from the outside
      Parameters:
      which - (should only be 0 or 1) indicating the index of the UncoveredResourceCard to draw
      Returns:
      ResourceCard chosen
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - when which is not 0 nor 1

    • setUncoveredCard

      public void setUncoveredCard(int which) throws NullPointerException
      UncoveredCards setter, it is taken from the deck
      Parameters:
      which - can be 1(first uncovered card) or 2(second uncovered card)
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if "which" is not 1 nor 2
      NullPointerException

    • isDeckEmpty

      public boolean isDeckEmpty()
      Check if the deck is empty
      Returns:
      true if the deck is empty and there is no uncovered card
